the titanomachy.title: The Titanomachy
the titanomachy.summary: A ten-year war in which Zeus and the Olympians overthrew the Titans.
events: Zeus frees his siblings from Cronus.
The Olympians and Titans wage war.
The Olympians win; Titans are imprisoned.

birth of athena.title: The Birth of Athena
birth of athena.summary: Athena is born from Zeus in an extraordinary way.

the creation.title: The Creation
events: In the beginning, there was only Chaos, the gaping emptiness. Then, either all by themselves or out of the formless void, sprang forth three more primordial deities: Gaea (Earth), Tartarus (the Underworld), and Eros (Love). Once Love was there, Gaea and Chaos were able to procreate and shape everything known and unknown in the universe.
